messages.subject: Re: responsibility was limits/showering
messages.msgSnippet: ... Or you could do less housework, too, and you could all do more things together as a family, and that doing things together would hopefully make everyone
messages.messageBody:
----------
>From: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
>To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Digest Number 4179
>Date: Sun, Nov 9, 2003, 3:27 PM
>

> They always have the option of saying no to anything I ask them to do, but
> they also realize that the more housework I do without help, the less time
> we have as a family to do anything.
>

Or you could do less housework, too, and you could all do more things
together as a family, and that doing things together would hopefully make
everyone feel nice and kind toward one another and you'd then get more help.

People are more important than a sparkling house.

Pam
